parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column mounting can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: The steering column feels loose or wobbly
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the steering wheel vibrates or shakes
the steering column bolts are stripped or broken.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rack and pinion can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: The steering feels stiff or difficult
the steering wheel vibrates or shakes
the vehicle pulls to one side
the rack and pinion unit leaks fluid.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cold power steering issue can cause difficulty steering the vehicle, especially when the engine is cold, which can lead to accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: The steering feels stiff or difficult when the engine is cold
the power steering assist is reduced or absent
the steering wheel is hard to turn.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Fuel injector failure can cause fuel leakage, leading to a fire hazard, and potentially result in engine stalling or failure to start, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
Fuel system vapor lock can cause the engine to stall or fail to start, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Stalling and Failure to Restart
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden stalling of the engine while driving can cause loss of control, accidents, and leave the driver stranded, which can be particularly dangerous for solo drivers, especially women.
symptoms: The engine light comes on while driving
